meanings.definition: To rule or control as an overlord.
meanings.sent1: The evil sorcerer overlorded the kingdom with an iron fist.
meanings.sent2: The king overlorded his subjects with fairness and justice.
meanings.sent3: The cat overlorded the household, demanding treats and attention.
meanings.sent4: The storm overlorded the landscape, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The overlorded dictator oppressed the people, crushing any dissent.

meanings.sent1: The overlorded peasants paid tribute to their ruler.
meanings.sent2: The overlorded lands were subject to strict laws and taxes.
meanings.sent3: The overlorded puppy wagged its tail happily, enjoying its pampered life.
meanings.sent4: The overlorded sky was painted with hues of orange and pink at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The overlorded castle stood tall and imposing, a symbol of power and control.
